Address villas - Hillcrest

Hadaeq Sheikh Mohammed Bin Rashid

Address villas - Hillcrest - is a new residential complex of villas located in Dubai Hills Estate.

4

5

Address villas - Hillcrest

download the brochure

Address villas - Hillcrest is a new villa complex situated in Dubai Hills Estate. Residents will be able to take some rest from the noise and bustle of the megapolis while having an opportunity to easily reach any keyspots of the emirate. The project was designed by the Emaar Properties, one of the emirate’s leading developers that is famous for such projects as Creek Edge, Vida Residences Dubai Marina, Burj Crown, and many others.

The total number of houses in Address Hills is 51. The future residents will be able to choose from 5-Bedroom villas designed in two types: the classic villas and the modern ones. The plots vary from 6,083 square feet to 10,805 square feet. Each block was designed taking luxury and calmness into account and equipped with an elevator to provide residents with maximum comfort. A breathtaking view on the Burj Khalifa and the famous horizon of Dubai opens from spacious balconies and panoramic windows.

Bluewaters Bay

Bluewaters Bay

Download the brochure

Bluewaters Bay is an upcoming residential complex located on the famous Bluewaters Island. The developer of the project is Meraas, who is known for projects such as Pearl Jumeirah, City Walk and La Mer. Bluewaters Bay is the best choice for those wishing to experience resort-inspired lifestyle on the shores of the Arabian Gulf.

The complex consists of two thoughtfully designed towers inspired by the glamorous vibes of Dubai. Future residents can choose from 1-4 bedroom apartments and exclusive penthouses. The total number of residential units in the complex is 672, and investors might also be interested in purchasing a retail unit within the development as well.

от 9 400 000 AED

Six Senses

Palm Jumeirah

As the first Six Senses hotel and residences in the UAE, Six Senses The Palm is a new milestone for the ultra-luxurious hotel chain. The project offers 60 luxurious hotel rooms and 162 exquisite residences located on the iconic Palm Jumeirah

3

3

Six Senses

download the brochure

Six Senses Residences is a new luxury waterfront project on Palm Jumeirah in Dubai. The development is the joint venture between the Select Group and ESIC, which have signed a management agreement with Six Senses Hotels Resorts Spas. The companies are introducing the first Six Senses hotel as well as branded residences to the UAE, which offer the luxury beachfront living.

The total area of the residential project will constitute 1.2M sqft, with the construction of Six Senses The Palm starting at the beginning of 2022 and the estimated date of completion being Q4 2024. The Six Senses Residences will include 162 ultra-luxury residences and a hotel with 60 rooms with gorgeous views of the Palm and the rest of Dubai, 60,000 sqft of amenities. The residential development offers a mix of properties, including 121 penthouses, 32 sky villas and 9 signature beachfront villas. All housing units will be managed by Six Senses, which will provide residents with privileged access to the hotel’s top-class amenities such as a tennis court, large swimming pools, a football field, restaurants, a library, bars, a children’s club and much more.

Seascape

Rashid Yachts & Marina

Emaar Seascape is a luxury residential complex located on the waterfront in the bustling Rashid Yachts & Marina area. The project offers 1-3 bedroom apartments and townhouses for sale with picturesque views of the marina, beach and surroundings

3

4

Seascape

download the brochure

Seascape is an new residential project in Rashid Yachts & Marina. The author of the project is the leading developer – Emaar Properties. The project will consist of four buildings boasting contemporary architectural design and interiors. Among units for sale are 1-3 bedroom apartments and 3-bedroom townhouses. The total number of units is 391, and 300 covered parking spaces will be available. A range of amenities will be available to residents of Emaar Seascape, including a pool, a splash park, a waterfront plaza, a gym, a community park, courts, a boardwalk promenade and much more. Purchasing a residential unit in Emaar Seascape is the perfect option for those who value their comfort and wish to make a profitable investment into their future. The project is planned to be completed in Q4 2026, and there is an opportunity to get a 10-year Golden UAE Visa while becoming an owner of a property in Mina Rashid Seascape.

Zuha Island

ZUHA Island

The exclusive residences on ZUHA Island will be serviced by the FIVE Hotel, which will offer an a la carte menu of services such as housekeeping, maintenance and catering, etc. Residents of the villas will be able to enjoy world-class dining experiences by ordering dishes from four main dining establishments in the exclusive community.

3

3

Zuha Island

download the brochure

Released in Q4 2022, ZUHA Island is a super-luxury secluded resort retreat by the award-winning ZAYA and FIVE Holdings, which is nestled within the World Islands, just 15 minutes’ away from the mainland of Dubai. Combining breathtaking scenery and a serene atmosphere, the private island will house a collection of 30 limited edition waterfront palatial villas with 6-bedroom layouts. The plot size of these gorgeous residences will range from 24,000 sq. ft to 41,000 sq. ft, out of which 19,656 sq. ft will be dedicated to the BUA. The master plan also includes the construction of a boutique resort with 80 waterfront residences, which are not for sale.

Featuring premium natural materials such as travertine and marble, the ultra-refined ZUHA Island villas will exude the ultimate sophistication and exquisiteness. Each royal residence will feature 4 unique levels, which will rise up from the beachfront to the vast horizon and will be centralised around a single breathtaking spiral staircase. For a truly extravagant and unique look, the forms and shapes of the ZUHA Island villas will be reminiscent of the island, ocean, wind and waves.

About Company

The founders of our company are professional investors with many years of expertise. They’ve been using the services of different real estate agencies for many years, so they've studied the real estate market of Dubai, Gulf states, the USA, Brasil, Uruguay, Argentine, the UK, Russia, and the CIS countries. It’s let them form their own methodology and vision — and bring their ideas to life.

Our mission is to provide our customers with A-level service, ultimate comfort, and security while adressing their every need as well as to guarantee the result that exceeds the expectations of our clients.More than 10 years of experience our founders and partners have made it possible to solve any task you’ve got in real estate of Dubai and Gulf states.

We offer free consultations on ways to get a residence permit in Dubai, on ways to open a bank account, corporate bodies’ registration, and other business-related topics.

TopLevel stands out providing free consultations on ways to get a residence permit and other business related questions. We are partners of many developers in Dubai which brings exclusive terms of cooperation to our clients.

FAQ

What are the stages of buying property in Dubai?

Buying property in Dubai takes place in several stages:

  • selection of a suitable facility;

  • conclusion of the contract;

  • transfer of the deposit to a seller (5-25%);

  • home maintenance contract;

  • registration in the name of the new owner (this stage is usually the one when the final settlement is made);

  • getting ownership.

Is buying property in Dubai a ground for getting UAE citizenship?

No, but in case the amount of transaction exceeds USD 240,000 the investor may get the UAE residence visa. It brings certain privileges to the buyer of residential, commercial or some other application such as:

  • the right to open a bank account;

  • the right to get the driver’s license;

  • the right to do business or be employed etc.

In case of installment purchase it’s possible to get residence visa or residence permit if the object is leased and the buyer has contributed at least 50% of total amount.

What should a buyer do to secure their funds during the transaction?

In general, when buying property in Dubai, the investors use the most secure way of payment — the wire transfer into the escrow account which means the developer receives the payment after the object is leased. A competent intermediary makes it way easier for both sides performing a number of important functions including the legal support of the transaction.

Can a foreigner make an installment purchase?

Many developers provide customers with this option. The first installment is usually 10% and about 50% are payed before the construction is finished.

Can I get a mortgage in Dubai?

Yes, you can as this option is available both for the residents and for the non-residents. The main requirements are age 21-65, a good credit score, and an appropriate level of income, sufficient to carry out the payments on time. Moreover, the same object can be purchased in installments and in a mortgage simultaneously.

Do I have to use the services of real estate agents? Can I conduct a transaction with a developer on my own?

Real estate agents accompany every transaction of sale and purchase of premises in Dubai. This guarantees the safety of transactions, the protection of interests of the investor, and the compliance with the laws of the country.
